name: Mobile Booster
author: Takanakui

sections.description:
Need some help with the mobile website experience? Need to keep your mobile visitors engaged? Need to increase your shop website sales conversion?

Mobile Booster provides a better user mobile experience in specific areas like the WooCommerce product page. The usage of smartphone, tablet to access websites is in high demand.

Se below the lisf of features of what our WordPress Mobile Booster can do for you.

  • Lazy Load Images in Mobile devices
  • Prefetch Internal URLS to speed up the navigation (Quicklink from Chromelabs)
  • Enhanced Add to Cart Buttons in WooCommerce Store

No coding knowledge is required. Works with all WordPress themes.

Links

  • Demo
  • Website

I need help or I have a doubt, check our Support

  • Great Support, our free support is above the average.

    Mobile Booster Support page
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Mobile Booster”
  3. Click “Install”

-or.

Download and install the .zip file in the WordPress plugin page of your website

-or-

  1. Unzip and upload the mobile-booster directory into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.changelog:

1.2

  • Update Freemius SDK

1.1

  • Lazy Load Images
  • Prefetch Internal URLS
  • SDK Security Fix

1.0

  • Initial Version
  • Mobile Footer in Product page
  • Background and text color options for the Add to cart button on mobile footer
